[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: THAT'S WHY ORIGINAL VINO D'ANCO PREMIUM
Categorie: Voorgerecht
Omschrijving: Fruity and dry with juicy notes. The wine is full-bodied, lively, gently dry and perfumed in flavor. This wine goes well with fish dishes, tapas, appetizers and aperitifs.
Prijs: 21.50 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: VILLA SAN MARTINO LE RIVE PINOT GRIGIO
Categorie: Overig
Omschrijving: This Pinot Grigio is generous pale yellow and very bright in color. Deliciously perfumed with impressions of conference pears and pineapple. Round, soft and fresh on the palate, with juicy pear, nectarine and white plum, and an attractive bitterness on the finish. Delicious with seafood, light fish dishes and pizza and more a super aperitif.
Prijs: 23.50 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: OROPASSO IGT VERETO CHARDONNAY / GARGAMELLE
Categorie: Wijnen
Omschrijving: The wine has a yellowish green color and a delicate bouquet of floral scents and subtle hints of citrus fruits. On the palate, it is fresh and crisp with a good balance. This wine is delicious with pasta, risotto, soup, fish, seafood, white meat and aged cheeses.
Prijs: 38.50 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: PRADIO FRIULI SAUVIGNON BLANC
Categorie: Voorgerecht
Omschrijving: The color of this wine is straw yellow with white light highlights. The aroma, intense and complex, reveals notes of ripe fruit. The taste is full-bodied and rich, with notes of ripe fruit. The taste is slightly citrusy, fresh and with mineral sensations. This wine goes well with cooked and raw fish, appetizers, fresh cheese and aged cheese.
Prijs: 39.50 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: ROQUENDE MERLOT
Categorie: Wijnen
Omschrijving: Full-bodied, silky smooth, with juicy aromas of ripe red and black fruit. A versatile wine that can be drunk every day and goes with many different dishes.
Prijs: 4.75 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: ROQUENDE CABERNET SAUVIGNON
Categorie: Overig
Omschrijving: Beautiful, fruity Cabernet Sauvignon, made from grapes from sunny southern France. The nose combines ripe fruit aromas and soft tannins. Great with meat from the grill or with cassoulet.
Prijs: 4.75 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Gerecht: EINSTEAD RED BLEND
Categorie: Overig
Omschrijving: Bright in colour and flavour with attractive aromas of strawberry and raspberry and red fruit. The finish is smooth and slightly creamy.
Prijs: 5.95 EUR

[MENU ITEM]

Categorie: Voorgerecht
